feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and tests.

frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.

frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Renders a loading spinner and message for pending UI states.

frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Exposes a query hook to check if a static asset URL is reachable using a robust availability check.

frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a light-themed color palette and base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.

frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and email copy function for reaching site support.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Allows users to list and create events with validation, backend integration, and formatted display.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable, filterable gallery with favorites, lightbox navigation, and admin/user delete actions using multiple hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and promotional content for the plushie community.

frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined plushie brands with descriptions and specialties.
